src_original: svayaṃ mama svāminâiva tāvad yad artham ātmany api nirvyapekṣāḥ /  ahaṃ kathaṃ svāmiṣu teṣu teṣu karomi mānaṃ na tu dāsabhāvam //
yeṣāṃ sukhe yānti mudaṃ munîndrāḥ yeṣāṃ vyathāyāṃ praviśanti manyum /
ādīptakāyasya yathā samantān /  na sarvakāmair api saumanasyam /
satvavyathāyām api tadvad eva na prītyupāyo 'sti mahākṛpāṇām //
tasmān mayā yajjanaduṣkhanena /  duṣkhaṃ kṛtaṃ sarvamahādayānāṃ /
tad adya pāpaṃ pratideśayāmi yatkheditās te munayaḥ kṣamantām //
ārādhanāyâdya tathāgatānāṃ sarvâtmanā dāsyam upaimi loke /  kurvantu me mūrdhni padaṃ janâughāḥ nighnantu vā tuṣyatu lokanāthāḥ //
ātmīkṛtaṃ sarvam idaṃ jagat taiḥ kṛpâtmabhir nâiva hi saṃśayo 'tra /
tathāgatârādhanam etad eva svârthasya saṃsādhanam etad eva /
lokasya duṣkhâpaham etad eva tasmān mamâstu vratam etad eva //
